thread.title: adidas’s New EQT Racing 91/16 Is Simply Pristine
thread.title_full: adidas’s New EQT Racing 91/16 Is Simply Pristine

author: Chris Danforth
title: adidas’s New EQT Racing 91/16 Is Simply Pristine
text:
Visit the original post to see all 2 images from this gallery. 
Brand: adidas.
Model: EQT Racing 91/16.
Key Features: Full Boost sole, mixed nubuck and mesh on the upper, and an ever-so-subtle hit of “Turbo Red” on the outsole.
Release Date: March 23, 2017.
Price: Likely priced around $100, based on previous EQT Racing releases.
Availability: adidas flagships, online .
Editor’s Notes: The forefoot window and all-white color scheme make this a prime choice for summer. adidas’s EQT line continues to be one of the most interesting segments from the German sportswear brand. While this is being positioned as an exclusive release for women, we imagine that won’t stop guys from copping.
